attributes.action: Create legislation that outlaws workplace bullying
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Give clear definition of workplace bullying, create a blacklist of managers who have abused their position,in carrying out bullying, on more than two occasions, preventing them from management positions for a minimum of 5 years.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
